pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ecological Inference for RxC Tables via Nonlinear Quadratic Optimization // Estimates RxC (R by C) vote transfer matrices (ecological contingency tables) from aggregate data by simultaneously minimizing Euclidean row-standardized unit-to- global distances. Acknowledgements: The authors wish to thank Generalitat Valenciana, Consellera de Educacin, Cultura, Universidades y Empleo (grant CIAICO/2023/031) for supporting this research.
